unnormalised: **Entertainment Buzz: Film Fest Season is Here, Yaar!**
normalised: entertainment buzz film fest season is here, yaar!

unnormalised: Lights, camera, ACTION! Film festivals are popping up all over, from the hills of Shimla to the beaches of Goa. Forget your Monday blues, 'cause the entertainment calendar is jam-packed!
normalised: lights, camera, action! film festivals are popping up all over, from the hills of shimla to the beaches of goa. forget your monday blues, 'cause the entertainment calendar is jam-packed!

unnormalised: Word on the street is that the Chennai International Film Festival is gearing up for its biggest year yet. Expect a smorgasbord of indie flicks, Bollywood bangers, and international cinema.
normalised: word on the street is that the chennai international film festival is gearing up for its biggest year yet. expect a smorgasbord of indie flicks, bollywood bangers, and international cinema.

unnormalised: And guess what? The Bangalore Short Film Festival is already accepting submissions! Got a killer story to tell? Dust off your camera and get cracking.
normalised: and guess what? the bangalore short film festival is already accepting submissions! got a killer story to tell? dust off your camera and get cracking.

unnormalised: But the real question is: which festival will serve the best biryani? Okay, maybe *that's* not the *real* question, but let's be honest, festival food is half the fun, right?
normalised: but the real question is: which festival will serve the best biryani? okay, maybe *that's* not the *real* question, but let's be honest, festival food is half the fun, right?

unnormalised: Rumors are flying that a certain festival in Kerala is even planning a special screening tied to Onam festivities. Think pookalam designs and powerful storytelling!
normalised: rumors are flying that a certain festival in kerala is even planning a special screening tied to onam festivities. think pookalam designs and powerful storytelling!

unnormalised: So, get your popcorn ready and mark your calendars. Film fest season is officially ON!
normalised: so, get your popcorn ready and mark your calendars. film fest season is officially on!
